mapper.insert: INSERT INTO feed( account, realName, nickName, picture, caption, location, tag, likeNum, profileImgUrl, time ) VALUES( #{account}, #{realName}, #{nickName}, #{picture}, #{caption}, #{location}, #{tag}, #{likeNum}, #{profileImgUrl}, now() )
mapper.select: SELECT f.num, f.account, f.realName, f.nickName, f.picture, f.caption, f.location, f.tag, f.likeNum, u.profileimgurl, u.id FROM feed as f join user as u on f.account = u.userAccount ORDER BY f.num DESC
